actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To decrease the matching funds requirement and authorize further appropriations for Keweenaw National Historical Park.

summary.text: Requires a one-to-one (currently, one-to-four) match of Federal funds to non-Federal funds contributed for financial and technical assistance to mark, interpret, and restore non-Federal properties within Keweenaw National Historical Park. Increases the authorization of appropriations for such assistance and for development of the Park.

titles.title: To decrease the matching funds requirement and authorize further appropriations for Keweenaw National Historical Park.
